Package View.Character

View.Character package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharacterGame
    This class is for view the details of the player in run time and also to modify characters several properties.
    CharacterJFrame
    The view class for creating a character.
    CharacterLoadImages
    This is a public class to load the character images.

Package View.Character Description

View.Character package. Includes all view items that follows MVC pattern for the character.
